bothWellRated.sentence: Hey, your buddy {parameter1} dig {parameter2} too ! Maybe grab a beer together ?
You and {parameter1} love the same {nodeType}, are you soulmates?

oppositeRates.sentence: Woh, there is a big difference of opinion between you and {parameter1}. Unlike you {parameter2} just hates this movie !
